text: Hello folks, anyone know how to render dynamic HTML from a CRM object field? I have tried setting the property as Multi-line text, but HS keeps messing with the value itself (wrapping it in P tags and stripping others). Setting it as Rich Text wont work as itâ€™s very limited in what HTML tags it supports. Any guidance is appreciated. Thanks!
